name: FROM ASHES, BLOOM
description:
🌵 Protect the oldest tree on Earth from Humanity
🍀 Tear through hordes of enemies
🌷 Sow trees to help you
🌴 Active Tower Defense rogue-like gameplay
🌻 Personalize your creature with new attacks



🌿 Huge amount of upgrades
🏭 Various of starting situation with unique skins
👾 A never seen before character with 10/10 procedural animation
😇 Play as an invincible mass destruction weapon
